banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: What I learned from 32 grueling interviews
videoData.socialTitle: What I learned from 32 grueling interviews

nodes.whoTheyAre: Ashwini Mrinal Bhagat is a part of the Global Human Resources team for State Street India, specialising in talent management and employee relations. She believes in creating new platforms for learning and is passionate about employee engagement. She’s also an ardent writer and contributes to daily newspapers and blogs on topics related to current affairs and human resources.

videoData.description: What's less fun than a job interview? Doing it again. And again. And again. Ashwini endured 32 interviews before she landed a job and kept notes on every experience and lesson along the way. Ranging from funny to unbelievable, she shares what she learned (lesson #3: don't wear green) and shows what it's like to search for work as an aspiring businesswoman in India.
videoData.socialDescription: What's less fun than a job interview? Doing it again. And again. And again.
